聽.definition: to listen to; to hear; to heed; to obey; a can (loanword from English "tin"); classifier for canned beverages; to let be; to allow (Taiwan pr. [ting4]); (literary) to administer; to deal with (Taiwan pr. [ting4])

聽上去.definition: to sound (difficult, worthwhile etc); to seem

聽不懂.definition: unable to make sense of what one is hearing

聽不進去.definition: not to listen; to be deaf to

聽事.definition: to hold audience; to advise on state affairs; to administer state affairs; audience hall; to listen in

聽任.definition: to let (sth happen); to allow (sb to do sth); to submit to; to yield

聽來.definition: to sound (old, foreign, exciting, right etc); to ring (true); to sound as if (i.e. to give the listener an impression); to hear from somewhere

聽信.definition: to listen to information; to get the news; to believe what one hears

聽信謠言.definition: to take heed of idle chatter (idiom)

聽候.definition: to wait for (orders, a decision, a judgment)

聽其自便.definition: to allow sb to do sth at his convenience

聽其自然.definition: to let things take their course; to take things as they come

聽其言而觀其行.pinyin: ting1 qi2 yan2 er2 guan1 qi2 xing2
聽其言而觀其行.definition: hear what he says and observe what he does (idiom, from Analects); judge a person not by his words, but by his actions

聽其言觀其行.pinyin: ting1 qi2 yan2 guan1 qi2 xing2
聽其言觀其行.definition: hear what he says and observe what he does (idiom, from Analects); judge a person not by his words, but by his actions

聽勸.definition: to heed advice; to listen to counsel

聽君一席話，勝讀十年書.pinyin: ting1 jun1 yi1 xi2 hua4 , sheng4 du2 shi2 nian2 shu1
聽君一席話，勝讀十年書.definition: listening to the words of a wise man can be superior to studying ten years of books (proverb)

聽命.definition: to obey an order; to take orders; to accept a state of affairs

聽天安命.definition: to accept one's situation as dictated by heaven (idiom)

聽天由命.definition: (idiom) to submit to the will of heaven; to resign oneself to fate; to trust to luck

聽審.definition: to attend court; to take part in a trial

聽寫.definition: (of a pupil) to write down (in a dictation exercise); dictation; (music) to transcribe by ear

聽小骨.definition: ossicles (of the middle ear); three ossicles, acting as levers to amplify sound, namely: stapes or stirrup bone 鐙骨|镫骨, incus or anvil bone 砧骨, malleus or hammer bone 錘骨|锤骨

聽得懂.definition: to understand (by hearing); to catch (what sb says)

聽從.definition: to listen and obey; to comply with; to heed; to hearken

聽憑.definition: to allow (sb to do as he pleases)

聽懂.definition: to understand (on hearing); to catch (what is spoken)

聽戲.definition: to attend an opera; to see an opera

聽房.definition: to eavesdrop outside bridal bedchamber (folk custom)

聽斷.definition: to judge (i.e. to hear and pass judgment in a law court); to hear and decide

聽書.definition: to listen to a performance of pinghua storytelling 評話|评话[ping2hua4]; to listen to an audiobook

聽會.definition: to attend a meeting (and hear what is discussed)

聽牆根.definition: to eavesdrop; to listen in secret to sb's conversations

聽牆根兒.definition: erhua variant of 聽牆根|听墙根[ting1 qiang2 gen1]

聽牌.definition: (mahjong) to be one tile away from completing a hand; (sports) to be on the verge of winning

聽窗.definition: to eavesdrop outside bridal bedchamber (folk custom)

聽筒.definition: telephone receiver; headphone; earphone; earpiece; stethoscope

聽而不聞.definition: to hear but not react (idiom); to turn a deaf ear; to ignore deliberately

聽聞.definition: to listen; to hear what sb says; news one has heard

聽見風就是雨.pinyin: ting1 jian4 feng1 jiu4 shi4 yu3
聽見風就是雨.definition: lit. on hearing wind, to say rain; to agree uncritically with whatever people say; to parrot other people's words; to chime in with others

聽訟.definition: to hear litigation (in a law court); to hear a case

聽話.definition: to do what one is told; obedient

聽話聽聲，鑼鼓聽音.pinyin: ting1 hua4 ting1 sheng1 , luo2 gu3 ting1 yin1

聽說.definition: to hear (sth said); one hears (that); hearsay; listening and speaking

聽說讀寫.definition: listening, speaking, reading and writing (language skills)

聽課.definition: to attend a class; to go to a lecture

聽講.definition: to attend a lecture; to listen to a talk

聽風就是雨.definition: lit. to believe in the rain on hearing the wind (idiom); to believe rumors; to be credulous

聽骨.definition: ossicles (in the middle ear); also written 聽小骨|听小骨

聽骨鏈.definition: chain of ossicles (in the middle ear)
